statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens'); vim=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.vim.mode // empty'); status="$model"; [ "$style" != "default" ] && status="$status | $style"; [ -n "$vim" ] && status="$status | $vim"; if [ -n "$used" ]; then used_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$used"); if [ "$used_int" -ge 80 ]; then status="$status | $(printf '\033[31mContext: %.1f%% used\033[0m' "$used")"; elif [ "$used_int" -ge 60 ]; then status="$status | $(printf '\033[33mContext: %.1f%% used\033[0m' "$used")"; else status="$status | Context: ${used}% used"; fi; fi; total=$((total_in + total_out)); [ "$total" -gt 1000 ] && status="$status | $(echo "scale=1; $total / 1000" | bc)K tokens" || [ "$total" -gt 0 ] && status="$status | ${total} tokens"; echo "$status"
